name: Praneeth Vedagiri
title: Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Specialist
tagline: Building intelligent web applications with modern tech stacks and AI integrations
bio: I am Vedagiri Praneeth, a passionate full-stack developer currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (AI) at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies like React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and TypeScript, I specialize in creating user-centric, high-performance applications. My portfolio includes successfully delivering projects such as an e-commerce platform, a job portal, and cutting-edge GenAI solutions including an AI-powered medical chatbot and resume automation system. During my internship at the Amrita Center for Wireless Networks, I focused on enhancing customer satisfaction by developing intuitive and impactful user interfaces. I am driven by a passion for solving complex problems through innovative and efficient solutions that bridge technology with real-world needs.
